game_description: Racquetball meets Breakout inside a giant pinball machine! Racket: Nx is a new kind of game that challenges the limits of what you can do with a racket and ball in VR. The game features: - 2 single player modes - a campaign and an endless runner. - Competitive multiplayer supporting cross platform. - A sick OST and the option to play your own music in game! - Cross Buy with the Rift. The game is played inside a giant glass dome, the walls of which light up with targets you must destroy with the ball. But this is no ordinary ball. Hit it with force and it will slam into the wall, rolling across it and bulldozing everything in its path. Use your racket's tractor beam to pull it back, or simply to line up your next shot exactly where you want it. Targets appear in Waves, and your goal is to destroy them all before your energy runs out. But targets aren't the only thing in the arena. So be quick, accurate and smart. Plan your shots well. Learn to control the ball to perfection.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), Japanese, Korean
review_1: You whack a ball and destroy stuff. No crazy rules to remember like tennis. Just get the ball to the targets, and the harder you hit it the longer it sticks to the dome plowing through targets. They have modes where a life bar counts down and you die if you don't hit health targets. But, you can play arcade zen mode, which is infinite life and infinite play. Perfect for a workout where I just want to switch my brain off and zone out. The music is pumping, and the ball is zooming. Initially I was change controller to other hand to even out the work. But, by accident I clicked the trigger on the other controller, and the racket changes hands! Instant game changer, bc you can use both controllers and just switch hands as needed! I don't know why the tutorials didn't mention that. I wfh, and play this for 1/2 hr during lunch for a quick workout, and it's been a great stress reliever.
